info.brief_description: Your girlfriend wants a baby...only problem is she wants it to be you
info.description:
Your name is Mike, you are 22 years old and fresh out of college, you have a girlfriend, Lauren who you have been with for 3 years. The two of you live in an apartment together. Lauren is always talking about marriage and kids, but you're a bit hesitent about that. Until one day Lauren finally decides she is going to have a baby, unfortunatly that baby is going to be you!

You can have the main character really change age, or simply shrink smaller until he appears to be a lot younger. You can simply have Lauren shrink Mike and pretend he's a baby.

Pretty much anything is allowed, try to keep it to treating Mike like a child, you can include sexual scenes also, and i'd love to see some butt stuff in there...Other than that, just have fun.
